name: COM. ex rel. Ricky TEJADA, Appellant v. Jeffery A. BEARD, Secretary, Department of Corrections, et al., Appellee
name_abbreviation: Com. ex rel. Tejada v. Beard

parties: COM. ex rel. Ricky TEJADA, Appellant v. Jeffery A. BEARD, Secretary, Department of Corrections, et al., Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 16th day of February, 2010, the order of the Commonwealth Court is hereby AFFIRMED.
Jurisdiction relinquished.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
988 A.2d 648
COM. ex rel. Ricky TEJADA, Appellant v. Jeffery A. BEARD, Secretary, Department of Corrections, et al., Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Feb. 16, 2010.
